meanings.definition: A temple tower of ancient Mesopotamia, having the form of a terraced pyramid of successively receding stories.
meanings.sent1: The ancient ziggurats were impressive structures built by the Mesopotamians.
meanings.sent2: Tourists marveled at the grandeur of the ziggurats in Mesopotamia.
meanings.sent3: The ziggurats decided to throw a party on top of themselves.
meanings.sent4: The ziggurats stood tall like guardians of the ancient city.
meanings.sent5: The ziggurats loomed over the landscape, a symbol of power and spirituality.
